project_name: Biodiversity associated with Constructed Hibernacula at North Campus Open Space (NCOS)
project_objectives:
• Compile a list of species that use and occupy constructed hibernacula at NCOS.
• Determine frequency of hibernacula use by species across multiple habitat types.
• Compare use of hibernacula and other habitat structures (salvaged logs and boulders).
project_sensor_layout_targeted_type: randomly selected constructed hibernacula, salvaged logs, and decoration boulders
project_admin_organization: Cheadle Center for Biodiversity and Ecological Restoration
data_citation: Dobson, A.L., Stratton, L.C., Clark, R.D., Frazer, S. . 2021. Last updated May 2025. Biodiversity associated with Constructed Hibernacula at North Campus Open Space (NCOS). http://n2t.net/ark:/63614/w12003592. Accessed via wildlifeinsights.org on 2025-05-13.
